definition: body covering of a living animal, make undecipherable or imperceptible by obscuring or concealing
details:
noun
- body covering of a living animal
= synonyms: pelt, skin
- the dressed skin of an animal, especially a large animal
= example: the dressed skin of an animal, especially a large animal
= synonyms: fell
verb
- make undecipherable or imperceptible by obscuring or concealing
= example: make undecipherable or imperceptible by obscuring or concealing
= synonyms: obscure, obliterate, veil, blot out
- cover as if with a shroud
= synonyms: cover
- prevent from being seen or discovered
= example: prevent from being seen or discovered
= synonyms: conceal
- be or go into hiding
= synonyms: hide out
